pageContext.claim: “I think what Israel is getting and what we're all getting, but what Israel is getting more than anything else is peace. They're going to have peace. As you know, UAE -- United Arab Emirates -- is a great warring nation, a very powerful nation in the region.”
pageContext.analysis: Unlike Jordan and Egypt, the UAE never fought in any of the six Arab-Israeli wars. The UAE military placed 45th of the 138 countries considered in a ranking by Global Firepower, an organization that annually rates the military might of nations.
